mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT /* 2018-07-19 choye 변경 */ T1.COMM_ID , T1.REFERENCE_ID , T1.REFERENCE_DIV , T1.STATUS , T1.CONTENTS , T1.EXPANSION1 , T1.USE_YN , T1.CREATOR , (SELECT T2.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS T2 WHERE T1.CREATOR = T2.USER_ID) AS CREATOR_NAME , (SELECT S1.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL S1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_USERS S2 ON S1.CD_DTL_NO=S2.DIVISION WHERE S1.CD_NO='200' AND S2.USER_ID=T1.CREATOR) AS CREATOR_DIVISION_NAME , T1.CREATED_DATE , T1.MODIFIER , (SELECT T3.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS T3 WHERE T1.MODIFIER = T3.USER_ID) AS MODIFIER_NAME , (SELECT S1.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL S1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_USERS S2 ON S1.CD_DTL_NO=S2.DIVISION WHERE S1.CD_NO='200' AND S2.USER_ID=T1.MODIFIER) AS MODIFIER_DIVISION_NAME , T1.MODIFIED_DATE , T1.STATUS_CODE FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY T1 WHERE T1.COMM_ID = #{commId}
SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY WHERE COMM_ID = (SELECT MAX(COMM_ID) FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY)
SELECT CONTENTS FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY WHERE COMM_ID = #{comments} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('30')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('40')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('20')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14', '60')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('99')
AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{schReferenceDiv}
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%')
AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY
CASE WHEN CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schKeyword},'%') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END,
CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT G1.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, T1.* FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY T1 , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14')
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('30')
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('40')
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('20')
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('99')
AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV = #{schReferenceDiv}
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%')
AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY
CASE WHEN T1.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schKeyword},'%') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END,
T1.CREATED_DATE DESC ) AS G1 WHERE G1.RNUM > 5 ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('30')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('40')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('20')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('99')
AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{schReferenceDiv}
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%')
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
